metadata.titleEn: Asian monsoon experiment on the Tibetan Plateau (GAME/Tibet) dataset for global energy water cycle (1997-1998)
metadata.titleCn: 全球能量水循环之亚洲季风青藏高原试验研究（GAME/Tibet）数据集（1997-1998）
metadata.description:
The GAME/Tibet project conducted a short-term pre-intensive observing period (PIOP) at the Amdo station in the summer of 1997. From May to September 1998, five consecutive IOPs were scheduled, with approximately one month per IOP. More than 80 scientific workers from China, Japan and South Korea went to the Tibetan Plateau in batches and carried out arduous and fruitful work.
The observation tests and plans were successfully completed. After the completion of the IOP in September, 1998, five automatic weather stations (AWS), one Portable Atmospheric Mosonet (PAM), one boundary layer tower and integrated radiation observatory (Amdo) and nine soil temperature and moisture observation stations have been continuously observed to date and have obtained extremely valuable information for 8 years and 6 months consecutively (starting from June 1997).
The experimental area is located in Nagqu, in northern Tibet, and has an area of 150 km × 200 km (Fig. 1), and observation points are also established in D66, Tuotuohe and the Tanggula Mountain Pass (D105) along the Qinghai-Tibet Highway. The following observation stations (sites) are set up on different underlying surfaces including plateau meadows, plateau lakes, and desert steppe. (1) Two multidisciplinary (atmosphere and soil) observation stations, Amdo and NaquFx, have multicomponent radiation observation systems, gradient observation towers, turbulent flux direct measurement systems, soil temperature and moisture gradient observations, radiosonde, ground soil moisture observation networks and multiangle spectrometer observations used as ground truth values for satellite data, etc. (2) There are six automatic weather stations (D66, Tuotuohe, D105, D110, Nagqu and MS3608), each of which has observations of wind, temperature, humidity, pressure, radiation, surface temperature, soil temperature and moisture, precipitation, etc. (3) PAM stations (Portable Automated Meso - net) located approximately 80 km north and south of Nagqu (MS3478 and MS3637) have major projects similar to the two integrated observation stations (Amdo and NaquFx) above and to the wind, temperature and humidity turbulence observations. (4) There are nine soil temperature and moisture observation sites (D66, Tuotuohe, D110, WADD, NODA, Amdo, MS3478, MS3478 and MS3637), each of which has soil temperature measurements of 6 layers and soil moisture measurement of 9 layers. (5) A 3D Doppler Radar Station is located in the south of Nagqu, and there are seven encrypted precipitation gauges in the adjacent (within approximately 100 km) area. The radiation observation system mainly studies the plateau cloud and precipitation system and serves as a ground true value station for the TRMM satellite.
The GAME-Tibet project seeks to gain insight into the land-atmosphere interaction on the Tibetan Plateau and its impact on the Asian monsoon system through enhanced observational experiments and long-term monitoring at different spatial scales.
After the end of 2000, the GAME/Tibet project joined the “Coordinated Enhanced Observing Period (CEOP)” jointly organized by two international plans, GEWEX (Global Energy and Water Cycle Experiment) and CL IVAR (Climate Change and Forecast). The Asia-Australia Monsoon Project (CAMP) on the Tibetan Plateau of the Global Coordinated Enhanced Observation Program (CEOP) has been started.
The data set contains POP data for 1997 and IOP data for 1998. 
Ⅰ. The POP data of 1997 contain the following.
 
1. Precipitation Gauge Network (PGN) 
 
2. Radiosonde Observation at Naqu 
 
3. Analysis of Stable Isotope for Water Cycle Studies 
 
4. Doppler radar observation 
 
5. Large-Scale Hydrological Cycle in Tibet 
 
(Link to Numaguchi's home page)
 
6. Portable Automated Mesonet (PAM) [Japanese] 
 
7. Ground Truth Data Collection (GTDC) for Satellite Remote Sensing 
 
8. Tanggula AWS (D105 station in Tibet) 
 
9. Syamboche AWS (GEN/GAME AWS in Nepal) 
 
Ⅱ. The IOP data of 1998 contain the following.
 
1. Anduo 
 
（1） PBL Tower, 2） Radiation, 3） Turbulence 
 
SMTMS

5. MS3608 （1） AWS （2） SMTMS （3） Precipitation
 
6. D105 （1） Precipitation (2) GTDC
 
7. MS3478(NPAM) （1） PAM （2） Precipitation

metadata.descriptionCn:
GAME/ Tibet 项目于1997 年夏季在安多(Amdo) 站作过短期预试验观测( PIOP) 。1998 年5～9 月, 安排了连续5 个加强观测期( IOP) , 每个IOP 约一个月。中、日、韩三国80 余名科学工作者分批赴青藏高原，进行了艰苦而卓有成效的工作。
各项观测试验计划顺利完成。并且从1998 年9 月加强观测结束后，5 个自动气象站(AWS) 、1 个自动气象综合观测站( PAM) 、1 个边界层塔及辐射综合观测站(Amdo) 及9 个土壤温度和湿度观测站一直连续观测至今, 取得了连续8 年零6 个月(从1997 年6 月开始) 极其珍贵的资料。
      试验区设在藏北那曲地区的一个150 km ×200 km 的区域内(图1)，同时在青藏公路沿线的D66,沱沱河和唐古拉山口(D105) 也建立了观测点。包括高原草甸、高原湖泊、荒漠化草原等不同下垫面上, 设置了以下观测站(点)：(1) 两个包括大气和土壤的多学科综合观测站:安多(Amdo) 和那曲(NaquFx) 。这两个站含有多分量辐射观测系统、梯度观测塔、湍流通量直测系统、土壤温湿度梯度观测、无线电探空以及作为卫星资料地面真值利用的地面土壤湿度观测网和多角度光谱仪观测等；(2) 6 个自动气象站(D66 、沱沱河、D105 、D110 、Naqu 和MS3608) 。每个测站都有风、温、湿、压、辐射、地表温度、土壤温湿度和降水等观测；(3) 设在那曲北和南各约80 km 处的PAM( Portable Automated Meso - net) 站(MS3478和MS3637) 有类似于上述两个综合观测站(Amdo和NaquFx) 的主要项目, 同时有风、温、湿的湍流观测；(4) 9 个土壤温度和湿度观测点(D66 、沱沱河、D110 、WADD、NODA、Amdo 、MS3478、MS3478和MS3637) , 每个测站都包含有6 层土壤温度和9 层土壤湿度测量；(5) 一个设在那曲以南的三维多普勒雷达站和邻近(约100 km) 区域内的7 个加密雨量站( Precipitation gauge) , 辐射观测系统主要研究高原云与降水系统, 并作为TRMM 卫星一个地面真值站。
    GAME-Tibet项目力求通过不同空间尺度的加强观测试验和长期监测，深入了解青藏高原的地气相互作用以及对亚洲季风系统的影响。
     GAME/ Tibet 项目2000 年结束后, 已加入GEWEX(全球能量和水循环试验) 与CL IVAR (气候变化和预测) 两个大型国际计划联合组织的“全球协调加强观测计划(CEOP) ”, 开始执行“全球协调加强观测计划(CEOP) 亚澳季风之青藏高原试验研究”(CAMP/ Tibet )
数据内容分为Prephase Observation Preriod (POP)1997年和IOP1998年

1、Precipitation Guage Network (PGN) 
2、Radiosonde Observation at Naqu 
3、Analysis of Stable Isotope for Water Cycle Studies

(Link to Numaguchi's home page)

7、Ground Truth Data Collection(GTDC) for Satellite Remote Sensing 
8、Tanggula AWS ( D105 station in Tibet ) 
9、Syamboche AWS (GEN/GAME AWS in Nepal)

1、Anduo

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the main data collection methods used in observing the Tibetan Plateau's interaction with the Asian monsoon system?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 观察青藏高原与亚洲季风系统相互作用的主要数据收集方法有哪些？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: automatic weather stations, portable automated mesonet, gradient observation towers, turbulence flux measurement systems, soil temperature and moisture measurement systems, radiosonde observations, precipitation gauge networks
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 自动气象站、便携式自动气象网、梯度观测塔、湍流通量测量系统、土壤温度和湿度测量系统、无线电探空观测、降水量计网。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where were the observational data collected for studying the water cycle and atmospheric interactions on the Tibetan Plateau?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 用于研究青藏高原水循环和大气相互作用的观测数据是在哪里收集的？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What challenges might researchers face when collecting data on the Tibetan Plateau over a long-term period?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 研究人员在长期收集关于青藏高原的数据时可能面临哪些挑战？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Who are the primary contributors involved in the data collection efforts on the Tibetan Plateau for the GAME/Tibet project?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: GAME/Tibet项目中参与青藏高原数据收集工作的主要贡献者是谁？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: Scientists from China, Japan, and South Korea
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 中国、日本和韩国的科学家

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the key features and attributes of the atmospheric and soil observational stations used in data collection for understanding the energy and water cycle in high-altitude regions?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于理解高海拔地区能量和水循环的数据收集的气象和土壤观测站的关键特征和属性是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: multidisciplinary comprehensive observation systems, radiation observation systems, gradient observation towers, direct measurement systems for turbulent flux, soil temperature and moisture gradient observations, radiosonde measurements, networks for ground truth soil moisture observations, multi-angle spectrometers, automatic weather stations, portable automated meso-net stations, wind measurements, temperature measurements, humidity measurements, pressure measurements, radiation measurements, surface temperature measurements, soil temperature measurements, soil moisture measurements, precipitation measurements
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 多学科综合观测系统、辐射观测系统、梯度观测塔、湍流通量直接测量系统、土壤温度和湿度梯度观测、无线电探空仪测量、地面实况土壤湿度观测网络、多角度光谱仪、自动气象站、便携式自动中尺度网络站、风测量、温度测量、湿度测量、气压测量、辐射测量、地表温度测量、土壤温度测量、土壤湿度测量、降水测量。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of utilizing multiple automated weather stations and multidisciplinary observation stations for data collection in understanding the Tibetan Plateau's impact on the Asian monsoon system?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 利用多个自动气象站和多学科观测站收集数据，以了解青藏高原对亚洲季风系统的影响，可能产生的结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Utilizing multiple automated weather stations and multidisciplinary observation stations can result in a comprehensive understanding of the interactions between the Tibetan Plateau's surface and atmosphere, providing valuable insights into how these interactions influence the Asian monsoon system. This approach allows for detailed measurements of various meteorological parameters, which help in assessing the hydrological cycle, atmospheric conditions, and energy exchanges over the plateau. Such data can improve climate models and forecasts, particularly in relation to monsoon patterns and their broader climatic impacts.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用多个自动气象站和多学科观测站，可以全面了解青藏 Plateau 的表面与大气之间的相互作用，从而提供有关这些相互作用如何影响亚洲季风系统的宝贵见解。这种方法允许对各种气象参数进行详细测量，有助于评估水文循环、大气条件和高原上的能量交换。这些数据可以改善气候模型和预测，特别是与季风模式及其更广泛的气候影响相关的方面。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives of implementing a multi-disciplinary observation network with various automated weather stations and soil moisture measurement systems in the context of the Asian monsoon and Tibetan Plateau studies?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在亚洲季风和青藏高原研究的背景下，实施多学科观测网络以及各种自动气象站和土壤湿度测量系统的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal of implementing a multi-disciplinary observation network with various automated weather stations and soil moisture measurement systems is to deeply understand the land-atmosphere interactions on the Tibetan Plateau and their impact on the Asian monsoon system. This network facilitates comprehensive data collection across different spatial scales, providing valuable insights into atmospheric conditions, soil moisture dynamics, and hydrological cycles in the region, thereby contributing to global energy and water cycle studies.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 实施一个多学科观测网络，配备各种自动气象站和土壤湿度测量系统，旨在深入了解青藏高原的陆气相互作用及其对亚洲季风系统的影响。该网络促进了不同空间尺度上的全面数据收集，为该地区的气象条件、土壤湿度动态和水文循环提供了宝贵的见解，从而为全球能量和水循环研究做出贡献。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the procedures and instrumentation involved in setting up and operating a comprehensive atmospheric and soil observation station in a high-altitude environment like the Tibetan Plateau?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在像青藏高原这样的高海拔环境中建立和操作一个综合大气和土壤观测站所涉及的程序和仪器是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: In the Tibetan Plateau, comprehensive atmospheric and soil observation stations are equipped with multi-component radiation observation systems, gradient observation towers, and turbulence flux direct measurement systems. Soil temperature and moisture gradient observations are conducted, along with radiosonde operations and ground truth data collection for satellite remote sensing. Stations include automatic weather stations (AWS) that measure wind, temperature, humidity, pressure, radiation, surface temperature, soil temperature, and moisture, as well as precipitation. Portable Automated Meso-nets (PAM) provide additional turbulence observations.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在青藏高原，综合大气和土壤观测站配备了多组分辐射观测系统、梯度观测塔和湍流通量直接测量系统。进行土壤温度和湿度梯度观测，同时进行探空操作和卫星遥感的地面实测数据收集。观测站包括自动气象站（AWS），可测量风速、温度、湿度、气压、辐射、地表温度、土壤温度和湿度，以及降水量。便携式自动中网（PAM）提供额外的湍流观测。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements or methodologies have enabled the collection of comprehensive atmospheric and soil data in challenging geographic regions like the Tibetan Plateau?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步或方法论使得在像青藏高原这样具有挑战性的地理区域收集全面的气候和土壤数据成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The establishment of multiple automated weather stations (AWS), comprehensive observation stations (like PAM), and the use of sophisticated instruments such as radiosondes, multi-component radiation observation systems, turbulence flux direct measurement systems, and soil moisture and temperature gradient observation networks have enabled the collection of extensive atmospheric and soil data in the Tibetan Plateau. Additionally, the integration of these technologies with satellite remote sensing for ground truth data collection has further facilitated comprehensive data collection in the region.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 多个自动气象站（AWS）、综合观测站（如PAM）的建立，以及使用先进仪器如探空仪、多组分辐射观测系统、湍流通量直接测量系统和土壤湿度与温度梯度观测网络，使得在青藏高原收集了大量的气象和土壤数据。此外，这些技术与卫星遥感的结合，用于地面实况数据收集，进一步促进了该地区的综合数据收集。
